p: Moreover, Sendlet al. reported that garlic’s component gamma-glutamyl-cysteines acts asan antagonist to inhibit ACE activity [ 37]. When Alliin reacts with the Alliinase enzyme, Allicin antagonizesthe endothelin-1 effect, decreases vasoconstrictor responses of Ang II anddeactivate NF-kB [ 33, 38– 42].
